attributes.action: I Jeanne-Marie Turner, would like to have the restriction to Pension index linking to the former Commonwealth countries lifted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Please begin the title of your petition with a verb, eg "lift the restriction to Pension Index...". As it is currently worded, your petition would read: "We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to I Jeanne-Marie Turner, would like to have....".

We would also ask you to consider whether you want all of the details about your family that you have included to remain in this petition and be displayed in such a public forum.

We also cannot accept petitions which contain web links or email addresses and would ask you to remove the email address from the text.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
